resizeMetadata.title: Image Resize Tool

resizeMetadata.keywords: image resize, photo resize, image scaling, crop image, resize photo, image editor, 图片尺寸调整, 图片编辑

resizeFAQ.title: Image Resize FAQ
resizeFAQ.subtitle: Answers to questions you might have during usage

q1.question: Which image formats are supported for resizing?
q1.answer: Support JPEG, PNG, WebP, BMP, GIF and other mainstream image formats. Can maintain original format or convert to other formats after resizing.

q2.question: How is the quality of resized images?
q2.answer: Uses high-quality image scaling algorithms to maintain image clarity while resizing, ensuring optimal visual effects.

q4.question: Can I batch resize multiple images?
q4.answer: Yes, supports batch upload and processing of multiple images. You can set unified dimension parameters and complete all image resizing at once.

q5.question: Is image processing done locally?
q5.answer: Yes, all image processing is completed locally in your browser, never uploaded to servers, ensuring your image privacy and security.

compression.title: Step 2: Compression Settings
compression.batchEnableMessage: Please upload images first to enable batch compression
compression.qualityModeDescription: Reduce file size by lowering image quality. Lower quality means higher compression, but images may appear blurred or distorted. If the original image already has low quality, the compressed file might become larger.
compression.sizeModeDescription: Specify target file size, system will automatically adjust quality and dimensions to reach the target. More precise control over file size, suitable for scenarios with specific size requirements.
compression.targetSizeHint: Recommended range: 50-2000KB, depending on image usage and quality requirements
compression.qualityVeryHigh: Very High Quality - Slight compression, minimal file size change
compression.qualityHigh: High Quality - Recommended setting, balanced quality and size
compression.qualityMedium: Medium Quality - Noticeable compression, suitable for web
compression.qualityLow: Low Quality - Heavy compression, possible distortion
compression.qualityVeryLow: Very Low Quality - Extreme compression, obvious distortion
compression.smartCompressionDescription: System will automatically detect compression effectiveness. If quality compression results in larger files, it will automatically try size adjustment to ensure file size reduction.
compression.compressionStrategyDescription: System will first try quality compression. If target size is not reached, it will automatically reduce dimensions until requirements are met.
compression.formatHints: JPEG: Smallest file size | PNG: Supports transparency | WebP: Best for modern browsers
compression.enableMessage: Please upload an image first to enable compression settings

hero.title: Free Online Image Compressor
hero.description: Reduce image file size while maintaining quality. Support JPEG, PNG, WebP, BMP, GIF formats. Fast, secure, and completely free to use.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Compress your images in three simple steps

step1.title: Upload Images
step1.description: Select single or multiple images from your device. Supports drag and drop for easy uploading.

step2.title: Choose Settings
step2.description: Select compression quality or target file size. Our smart algorithms will handle the rest.

step3.title: Download Results
step3.description: Download your compressed images individually or as a ZIP file for batch processing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about image compression

q1.question: What image formats are supported?
q1.answer: We support JPEG, PNG, WebP, BMP, and GIF formats. You can upload any of these formats and choose your preferred output format.

q2.question: Is there a file size limit?
q2.answer: For optimal performance, we recommend files under 10MB. Larger files may take longer to process but are still supported.

q3.question: Are my images stored on your servers?
q3.answer: No, all image processing happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy and security.

q4.question: How much can I compress my images?
q4.answer: Compression results vary depending on the original image and settings. Typically, you can achieve 50-80% file size reduction while maintaining good quality.

q5.question: Can I compress multiple images at once?
q5.answer: Yes! Our batch processing feature allows you to compress multiple images simultaneously and download them as a ZIP file.

bandwidth.description: Lower bandwidth consumption means faster uploads, downloads, and reduced data costs.

seo.title: Better SEO Performance
seo.description: Faster loading images improve your website's SEO ranking and Core Web Vitals scores.

metadata.termsDescription: Read the terms that govern how you may use the Mini Image Compressor tools.
metadata.privacyDescription: Understand how Mini Image Compressor handles uploads, metadata, and cleanup.

common.contact: If you have any questions, please contact us at {email}.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of the Mini Image Compressor web application. By accessing or using the service, you agree to these Terms.

service.title: Service Overview
service.body: Mini Image Compressor provides browser-based tools to compress, resize, and process images. Certain flows rely on our managed Cloudflare R2 storage and PostgreSQL database to deliver downloads and maintain short-lived processing history.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
items: Upload only files that you are authorized to process and share.
Do not distribute malicious, abusive, or unlawful content through the service.
Avoid probing, scanning, or reverse engineering the service beyond publicly documented capabilities.

processing.title: Image Processing & Retention
processing.body: Uploaded files may be stored temporarily in Cloudflare R2 so that compression and resizing can complete successfully. Files and related metadata are scheduled for deletion roughly 24 hours after processing via the automated cleanup tasks.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.body: All software, documentation, and branding associated with Mini Image Compressor remain the property of the project maintainers. You retain ownership of your images and grant us a limited license to process them solely for providing the service.

liability.title: Disclaimer & Liability
liability.body: The service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for lost data, business interruption, or any indirect or consequential damages resulting from your use of the service.

changes.title: Changes to These Terms
changes.body: We may update these Terms to reflect new features or legal requirements. The 'Last updated' date will change accordingly, and continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

terms.closing: If you cannot agree to these Terms, please discontinue use of Mini Image Compressor.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Mini Image Compressor handles information related to your use of the service.

dataWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
dataWeCollect.body: We store limited metadata about the files you process, including file name, size, format, and processing preferences. Account registration is not required.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Information
items: Provide the compression, resizing, and download functionality you request.
Monitor service health, troubleshoot issues, and improve reliability.
Run automated cleanup routines that remove expired files and database records.

storage.title: Storage & Retention
storage.body: Uploaded files are stored in Cloudflare R2 in the region configured for your bucket. Files and related metadata are typically deleted about 24 hours after processing, or sooner if you invoke manual cleanup.

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParties.body: Cloudflare R2 supplies object storage for uploads and results. PostgreSQL stores structured metadata. These providers may process data in jurisdictions relevant to their infrastructure.

yourChoices.title: Your Choices
yourChoices.body: You can use the provided cleanup interface or contact us to remove stored files sooner. Avoid uploading sensitive personal data if you require stronger confidentiality guarantees.

privacy.closing: By using the service you consent to this Privacy Policy.

gridMetadata.title: Nine-grid collage generator
gridMetadata.description: Free browser-based nine-grid collage maker. Upload unlimited photos, merge cells, and export high-resolution layouts for X.com, Instagram, and WeChat Moments without leaving the page.
gridMetadata.keywords: nine-grid collage, photo grid, instagram grid, collage maker, 拼图, 九宫格

hero.title: Nine-grid collage maker
hero.description: Arrange unlimited photos into customizable nine-grid collages. Drag, merge, and export high-resolution layouts for X.com, Instagram, or WeChat Moments.

templates.heading: Templates & layouts
templates.subheading: Start with a preset or merge adjacent cells to craft your own composition.

classic.label: Classic 3x3
classic.description: Nine equal squares for a clean, balanced grid.

focus.label: Hero spotlight
focus.description: Make the top-left tile larger and let supporting photos wrap around it.

stripTop.label: Wide header
stripTop.description: Use a full-width banner on top with six evenly sized tiles below.

columnLeft.label: Tall sidebar
columnLeft.description: Reserve a vertical column for a hero image while keeping the other tiles square.

stats.imagesHint: Drag or click to add as many photos as you need.
stats.assignedHint: Drag to rearrange or trigger auto fill at any time.
stats.gridHint: Merge cells or switch templates to adjust the layout.
stats.templateHint: Switch presets or adjust spans to fine-tune the composition.

upload.heading: Upload photos
upload.hint: Files stay on this device—drag or click to add.

grid.heading: Arrange your grid
grid.subheading: Drag images, merge cells, and preview your final layout in real time.

preview.heading: Preview Final Result
preview.subheading: View the complete composed image, click edit to return to adjustment.

cells.heading: Cell controls
cells.subheading: Select a cell to adjust spans or reset it.
cells.mergeHint: Increase row or column span to merge neighbouring slots; contained cells are removed automatically.
cells.splitHint: Return spans to 1 x 1 to split the area and auto-fill missing cells.
cells.noSelection: Select a cell on the grid to edit spans.

tips.title: Usage Tips
tips.dragDrop: Drag images to cells to assign

images.heading: Image library
images.subheading: Click to assign to the selected cell or drag directly onto the grid.
images.empty: Upload photos to start building your collage.

export.heading: Export & share
export.subheading: Download a single high-resolution image that is ready for social sharing.
export.qualityHint: Higher values keep more detail but increase file size.
export.tip: Everything is rendered locally in your browser—no uploads or servers involved.

messages.overlapError: That merge overlaps another cell. Reduce the span or reset surrounding cells first.
